content.question: Which of the following is an example of an object in translational equilibrium?

choices.label: An object undergoing projectile motion with no air resistance
A car turning a corner on level pavement at constant speed
A sled sliding at constant velocity down a hill.
A ball being swung in a vertical circle at constant speed.

content.answer: A sled sliding at constant velocity down a hill.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
